person_analysis.overview: Kiarash Sotoudeh is a **Computer Science undergraduate at the University of Toronto** (expected 2027) with strong interests in programming languages, compilers, operating systems, and machine learning. He has hands-on experience in **systems programming and AI infrastructure**, including contributions to PyTorch, an internship at **AMD’s Datacentre GPU Organization**, and a Cash App apprenticeship building ESG scoring tools. As **VP of Infrastructure at UTMIST**, he launched open-source AI initiatives, while also leading in student organizations such as the Computer Science Student Union and Vic Records. Outside of CS, he is a writer and musician, blending technical rigor with creativity.
person_analysis.executive_summary: Kiarash Sotoudeh is an ambitious **UofT Computer Science student (2023–2027)** with internships at **AMD and Cash App**, contributions to **PyTorch**, and leadership experience in **UTMIST** and the **Computer Science Student Union**. Focused on systems, compilers, and AI, he combines technical depth with creativity, also serving as **President of Vic Records** and engaging in writing and music.
